code: import axios from'axios';import'dotenv/config';export var addCart=function addCart(data){return{type:'ADD_CART_DATA',payload:data};};export var deleteCart=function deleteCart(data){return{type:'DELETE_CART_DATA',payload:data};};export var addQty=function addQty(id){return{type:'ADD_QTY',payload:id};};export var reduceQty=function reduceQty(id){return{type:'REDUCE_QTY',payload:id};};export var chartHistory=function chartHistory(){return{type:'GET_CHART',payload:axios({method:'GET',url:process.env.REACT_APP_URL+'/order/chart'})};};export var postOrder=function postOrder(data){return{type:'POST_ORDER',payload:axios({method:'POST',url:process.env.REACT_APP_URL+'/order',data:data})};};
